extended_tooltips.text: Hailstorm: Launches <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterHailstorm_StartPersistent.periodic.count+1"/> piercing shards of ice in target direction. Each shard inflicts <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterHailstorm_Damage.amount" style="Red"/> damage to ground enemies.
Lightning Strike: Calls down lighting strike to inflict <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterLightStrike_DamageRadius.amount" style="Red"/> damage to enemies in target area.

Hush: Pacifies enemies for <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterHush_DebuffInitial.duration"/> second and reduces their attack damage and attack range by 50%.
When killed affected enemies will spawn a short-lived phantom that has <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterPhantom.vital_health.maximum"/> life and attacks for <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterPhantom_WeaponDamage.amount"/> damage every <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterPhantom_Weapon.period"/> seconds.
Resilient and Hero enemies are immune to the effect.

Meteor Shower: Bombards area with frozen meteors, dealing <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_PeriodicDamageRadius.amount*duckiesCloneCaster_PeriodicPersistent.periodic.count*(duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.count+1)" style="Red" precision="0"/> damage over <d ref="(duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.count+1)*duckiesCloneCasterBlizzard_InitialPersistent.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds.

Avatar: Increases health by <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterAvatar_HealthDisplayDummy.amount" style="Bold"/>%, gains resilience and an empowered attack that deals <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterAvatar_WeaponDamage.amount" style="Red"/> damage. Lasts <d ref="duckiesCloneCasterAvatar_Buff.duration"/> seconds.
